overview: Zelman Yakubov (age 30) is the Chief Executive Officer and sole director of Traders Circle. Mr. Yakubov worked in the securities industry for over a decade, in 2003 Mr. Yakubov started out as a trader at Barkley Trading, then in 2005 he served as an analyst at J.H. Darbie & Co., a Wall Street financial services firm, and in late 2007 Mr. Yakubov worked as an institutional sales representative at Hedge Fund Capital Partners. In 2009, Mr. Yakubov enrolled in John Jay University as a full time student, graduating in 2012 with a B.A. in Criminal Justice and a minor in Economics. Mr. Yakubov founded Traders Circle while he was attending college.
